analysis.functional_summary: This module defines a structure for handling customer number operations, including obtaining a new customer number, rolling back a transaction, and retrieving the current customer number.

Step 2: Based on the value, perform operations related to customer number
Step 3: Set CUSTOMER-NUMBER, NEWCUSNO-SUCCESS, or NEWCUSNO-FAIL-CODE accordingly
